last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mehar Posh is a 2020 Pakistani romantic drama serial premiered on 3 April 2020 on Geo Entertainment. It is produced by Abdullah Kadwani and Asad Qureshi under 7th Sky Entertainment. It stars Ayeza Khan and Danish Taimoor in their seventh project together.
